scripts.init: npm install & npm run make-filesystem & npm run launch-ledger
scripts.reset: npm run reset-filesystem & npm run reset-ledger && rm -f ./restore.txt
scripts.make-filesystem: mkdir -p build & mkdir -p cache & mkdir -p db & mkdir -p logs & mkdir -p templates
scripts.reset-filesystem: npm run clear-filesystem && npm run make-filesystem
scripts.clear-ledger: docker-compose -f ./radix/compose-ledger.yml down && docker rm -f $(docker ps -a -q) && docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q)
scripts.reset-ledger: npm run clear-ledger && npm run launch-ledger
scripts.start: npm run sync && npm run launch-ledger && npm run server & npm run interface-dev
scripts.launch: npm run server & npm run interface
